entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm except 5 cm over northern sections. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
